participant_1.background:

content.text: I love to travel and explore, but I always make sure to spend time with my family, too.
I love to travel, too. I just got back from a trip to Europe.
I went to France, Germany, and Italy.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Europe.
You should definitely go! It's such a beautiful place.
I will try to go soon.
What do you like to do with your family?
We like to go on hikes, play frisbee, and just spend time together.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I wish I had more time to spend with my family.
You should make time for them. They're the most important people in your life.
You're right. I'll try to do that more often.
Good! I'm sure they'll appreciate it.
